block.p: TAXERMAN-Arthur. Of Bergenfield, NJ. Beloved husband of Ruth (nee Hyman). Devoted father of Alan Taxerman and Roberta Taxerman Smith. Cherished fatherin-law of Michael Smith. Loving grandfather of Emily and Danielle. Services were held Sunday. Contributions may be made to The Uniformed Fire Officers Association of the City of New York, 225 Broadway, NYC 10007. For information ''Gutterman-Musicant'' 800-522-0588.
